alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 12:25PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1225 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Hastings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Hastings, Andalusia, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores and Butler Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
